title.value: Communicating Study Design Trade-offs in Software Engineering
title.justification: The title is clearly stated at the beginning of the document.
title.quote: Communicating Study Design Trade-offs in Software Engineering

extractions.description: The paper discusses the importance of reflecting on study limitations in software engineering research and proposes a focus on trade-offs to improve the understanding and reporting of these limitations. It introduces guidelines for documenting trade-offs to promote better assessment and replication of research.

type.justification: The paper focuses on discussing ideas and introducing guidelines related to research methodologies in software engineering, rather than providing experimental results.
type.quote: We propose to evolve the existing practice of communicating threats to validity into a richly detailed commentary of the design trade-offs made for a study.

name.justification: The primary focus of the paper is on improving research methodologies in software engineering.
name.quote: CCS Concepts: â€¢ Software and its engineering;

name.justification: The paper discusses empirical software engineering in the context of study limitations and trade-offs.
name.quote: Additional Key Words and Phrases: Empirical software engineering, threats to validity, empirical study design.
